member.name: T:Present.Wrap.Program
member.summary: Entry point for the Wrap program. The wrap program is a CLI interface for Present's code generation utilities.

member.name: P:Present.Wrap.Program.Type
member.summary: Gets the .NET type to be wrapped.

member.name: P:Present.Wrap.Program.Output
member.summary: Gets the path where the wrapper class code file should be output.

member.name: P:Present.Wrap.Program.Verbose
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether verbose logging is enabled.

member.name: P:Present.Wrap.Program.Quiet
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether quiet logging is enabled (i.e. logging is turned off).

member.name: M:Present.Wrap.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Initial method called when the program is started. This is routed to the CommandLineUtils NuGet package to parse the command line arguments, which then subsequently runs the method.
member.param: The command line arguments supplied to the program.

member.name: M:Present.Wrap.Program.OnExecute
member.summary: Entry point after the command line utilities parser has run (the properties on this class should be populated based on the command line arguments supplied).
